inclusion.criterion: Cirrhosis of the liver based on biopsy or clinical and radiographic criteria
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Ability to provide informed consent (Grade 0 to 1 HE)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Absence of improvement in renal function after adequate fluid resuscitation using either normal saline or blood products
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Previous history of sensitivity/allergy to lactulose or rifaximin or rifampin
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has Parkinson's disease, mild Hoehn-Yahr Stage I. He is alert and cooperative.
